text: Bayamón is a rapid transit station in San Juan agglomeration, Puerto Rico. It is the western terminus of the Tren Urbano system, behind Deportivo. The station is located in Bayamón. The trial service ran in 2004, however, the regular service only started on 6 June 2005. ==References== Category:Tren Urbano stations Category:Railway stations in the United States opened in 2004 Category:2004 establishments in Puerto Rico
title: Bayamón station
